channel.title: Benchmarks on Linked Data Benchmark Council
channel.description: Recent content in Benchmarks on Linked Data Benchmark Council

item.title: LDBC Graphalytics Benchmark (LDBC-Graphalytics)
item.description: The Graphalytics benchmark is an industrial-grade benchmark for graph analysis platforms such as Giraph.

item.title: LDBC Semantic Publishing Benchmark (LDBC-SPB)
item.description: The Semantic Publishing Benchmark (SPB) is an LDBC benchmark for testing the performance of RDF engines inspired by the Media/Publishing industry.

item.title: LDBC Social Network Benchmark (LDBC-SNB)
item.description: The Social Network Benchmark consists in fact of three distinct benchmarks on a common dataset, since there are three different workloads.
